name: Me and My Friends Are Finding Trash
name_original: Me and My Friends Are Finding Trash
description:
The city parks are LITTERED with fantastic goodies; candy wrappers, paper, toys, even the occasional magic mushroom! You and your friends are hunting for these goodies, searching high and low for every little piece of trash-- I mean, treasure-- one can get their grubby little paws on. The more friends you have, the more ground you can cover and the more your collection will grow! 

Use the arrow keys/WASD (D-pad for controllers) to point your critter in the right direction. Use Parsec for multiplayer.

Created during Global Game Jam 2021
